home.description: I am a computer science student passionate about development and cybersecurity. I am currently in the 2nd year of BTS SIO at the EPSI engineering school. I am looking for an internship for this second year and a work-study program for my 3rd year.

about.title: About me
about.card1_desc: Hello, my name is Killian Gascon, I am currently a computer science student in order to become a developer or cybersecurity expert.
about.card2_degrees: Degrees : Driving license, General Baccalaureate, PSC1 (first aid diploma)
about.card3_desc: Programming, drawing on a graphics tablet and paper, reading, video games, beekeeping, cycling, doing sports, music.

work.card1_desc: Game developed in C++ with unreal engine 5 for the Epsi school to present the life of a computer science student in the HEP campuses.
work.card2_desc: Personal project with the realization of a facial and object recognition AI in Python.
work.card3_desc: School project aimed at managing multiple art galleries, considering exhibition schedules and venues.

contact.contact_desc: If you would like to contact me, you can use the information below.
